OOC: I'm around. Just waiting for Lurker to post. If your reading this Lurk, MOVE YOUR A$$! 
The preceding has been paid for by the 
New World Order 
 "cardhead649 <cardhead649@...>" <cardhead649@...> wrote: OOC: Anybody home?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" 
<cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Sick and twisted is just fine - gives me an excuse to put 
> Phoenix through some more flashbacks.  Only one of the Rogues took 
> any 'liberties' on her, but that one is the most twisted bot this 
> side of ... well, he's sick, let's leave it at that.  BTW, she's 
not 
> just cute - whoever built her was an aesthetic genius; Phoenix's 
body 
> and face are sheer perfection for appearance, since her weaponry 
and 
> beast-form components remain folded neatly away most of the time.  
> Only her wings give a hint of having an alt-mode, making her look 
> like a red-and-gold angel.
> 
> Phoenix::
> 
> The fembot notices Heartbreak's constant attention, and she knows 
> what he has in mind.  She expects no less from a group that reminds 
> her all too well of the Rogues.
> 
> Phoenix sits down and hugs her knees up against her torso, resting 
> her back against the side wall.  Putting her head down, she slips 
> into a sleep cycle, knowing she might not get a chance later.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : Razor : :
> > Razor leads the rest of the group to the holding area.
> > Razor: Put the prisoner in that cell.
> > : : Wolfenstein : :
> > Wolfenstein pushes Phoenix into the cell. He is still worried 
about 
> what they will do to her though. He doesn't care about the 
branding, 
> that is physical and can be repaired. He is worried about some of 
the 
> liberties the boys may take on her.
> > Wolfenstein: I saw the CR room. I'll go take care of the insignia 
> and paint job now. Dont start the party without me. C'mon 
Skulletron.
> > Wolfenstein goes to the CR room and gets in a chamber. The CR 
> chamber begins it's work.
> > : : Diesel : :
> > Diesel activates the forcefield on the cell so Phoenix cant 
escape.
> > Diesel: Hurry up with that branding torch, Hollywood.
> > : : Heartbreak : :
> > HBK hadn't taken his eyes off of the captured femme bot. On 
> Cybertron his fame had brought him many femme's but it was always 
> more fun with the unwilling. He hoped they would hurt this cute 
> Predacon alot.
> > OOC: Wow I'm making these guys sick and twisted.
> > The preceding has been paid for by the
> > New World Order
> 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Hollywood Narrator" 
> > <hollywood.narrator@v...> wrote:
> > > OOC: My pathetic post. Don't mind me, I just wanted to show I'm 
> > alive.
> > > 
> > > BIC:
> > > 
> > > Deemos approaches and watches silently, somehow looking both 
> proud 
> > and upset simultaneously. The reason for this was unknown, but 
> Deemos 
> > had always been a disturbed robot anyway. Spider walks up and 
> appears 
> > very excited. Arrow is nowhere in sight.
> > > 
> > > Spider: I just hope I can be great enough one day for this 
team. 
> As 
> > great as I am, that task may be impossible.
> > > 
> > > Deemos: I sacrificed my honor and became a traitor, and there 
was 
> > no turning back. I paid my dues through hard work and became a 
> leader 
> > of a small ill fated faction and I'm still not great. I don't 
think 
> > you know what greatness is.
> > > 
> > > His sight never strayed from Phoenix while speaking to Spider.
> > > 
> > > Spider: Yeah... Yeah.
> > > 
> > > The furious Spider tries to pretend Deemos doesn't exist for a 
> > moment. He tries to hide his resentment of what Deemos said, but 
is 
> > unable. He appears really immature, but he was a young bot and 
very 
> > arrogant...
> > >

> > >   an 
> > >   > > alien concept to her.  Knowing little about Hydras or

> > >   > > is unaffected by Skulletron's arguement.  However, she

> > >   be 
> > >   > > able to hear her.  "What would you do?"  Somewhere in the

> > >   > > mind, a memory thought long deleted comes to the 
surface.

> > >   sees

> > >   > > convent she had once called home.  She sees Flicker stand 
> up 
> > to 
> > >   > them, 
> > >   > > despite being hopelessly overmatched.  In desperation, 
she 
> > had 
> > >   > > surrendered herself to protect him and her people.  Now, 
it 
> > seems 
> > >   > to 
> > >   > > her to be the only route open once again.  
> > >   > > 
> > >   > > "I ... I surrender ..." she says aloud, her voice choked 
> from 
> > >   more 
> > >   > > than just the wolf-bot's arm.

has
